titles.title: Electing Members to certain standing committees of the House of Representatives.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary:
1/21/2015--Passed House without amendment. (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Elects specified Members to the following House Committees: (1) Appropriations, and (2) the Budget.
